headline: Private equity firm Audax Group seeks over $1.5 billion for BlueCat Networks, sources say
summary: Private equity firm Audax Group is ​exploring a sale of cybersecurity provider ‌BlueCat Networks, which could fetch more than $1.5 ‌billion, according to people familiar with the matter.  The private equity firm, which bought BlueCat in 2022, has hired JPMorgan ⁠to run ‌the sale process, which is currently under way, several of ‍the sources said.  Representatives for Audax Group and BlueCat did not respond to requests for ​comment, while a spokesperson for JPMorgan declined ‌to comment.

headline: J.P. Morgan Asset Management Welcomes Pam Hess as Retirement Strategist
summary: J.P. Morgan Asset Management today announced the appointment of Pam Hess as Executive Director and Retirement Strategist on the Retirement Insights team reporting to Michael Conrath, Chief Retirement Strategist. This key hire reflects the firm's ongoing commitment to investing in resources that help financial professionals, participants and plan sponsors navigate today's complex retirement landscape.

headline: How Investors May Respond To Exponent (EXPO) After JP Morgan's New Overweight Rating
summary: JP Morgan recently initiated coverage on Exponent with an Overweight/Buy rating, highlighting the firm’s position as a leading science and engineering consulting company and expressing confidence in its growth and profitability prospects. An interesting angle for investors is that this fresh endorsement comes from an analyst with a track record of positive returns, adding weight to the new coverage.
